reviewText: Juventud Guerrera may not speak english good, but you cannot turn your eyes away from this must see interview. Learn from "The Juice" about his career that spans around the world from Mexico to ECW to WCW to WWE. Find out what happpend the day of Juvie's infamous drug-induced outrage in Australia (Prepare to see a man ashamed of his immature behavior :( ) Go behind the scenes of WCW and its well-known politics. Also includes Juvie's take on Hulk Hogan, Eric Bischoff, Vince Russo, Kevin Nash, and Bash at the Beach 2000.
